page.title: 18SPORTS AROUND NEWQUAY
page.content: We found 16 different recreations. They were:{-}Table Tennis{-}Badminton Squash{-}Weight-lifting{-}Walking{-} Country & Western Music{-}Water Skiing Football{-}Golf{-}Tennis{-}Cricket{-} Surfing{-}Fishing{-}Hunting{-}Shooting Health Club. These are special to our area:-{SURFING}A swimmer goes out to deep water in the sea and when a big wave comes he stands on his surfboard riding on the wave towards the shore. {JOGGING}is a way of running slowly for a long distance. It is very popular in Newquay because of the health boom. Many people jog in the morning to keep fit. {SWIMMING}We do a lot of swimming because of our sandy beaches and our clear sea. {FISHING}We fish from the beach and from the rocks. Our catches are usually Mackerel, Cod, Plaice and Conger Eels. Many tourists enjoy tak- ing part in these recreations.
